blocks.name: aalioulem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ aaliou . An integer polynomial cannot inflate the denominator of a rational by more than its degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2)), csu(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, cfv(cdgr, c0)), co(cfv(cfv(ccoe, c0), cv(hs0)), cmul, co(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cexp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cz)), wcel(co(c1, cdiv, c2), cc))

blocks.name: aaliou
blocks.content: Liouville's theorem on diophantine approximation: Any algebraic number, being a root of a polynomial ` F ` in integer coefficients, is not approximable beyond order ` N = deg ( F ) ` by rational numbers. In this form, it also applies to rational numbers themselves, which are not well approximable by other rational numbers. This is Metamath 100 proof #18. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: geolim3
blocks.content: Geometric series convergence with arbitrary shift, radix, and multiplicative constant. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Nov-2014.)

thm geolim3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c3), clt, nat1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, c3)))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eqbr(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cli, co(c2, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, c3)), cseq(c0, caddc, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0))))), w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), cseq(c0, caddc, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))))), wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0))))))
  seqeq3(c1, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))), c0, caddc)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cseq(c0, caddc, cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0))))), cli, co(c2, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, c3))), wbr(cseq(co(c0, caddc, cneg(c0)), caddc, co(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))), cshi, cneg(c0))), cli, co(c2, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, c3))))

  isermulc2(hs0, nat0, co(cmpt(s0, cfv(cuz, c0), co(c2, cmul, co(c3, cexp, co(cv(s0), cmin, c0)))), cshi, cneg(c0)), c2, co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, c3)), cn0, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c3, cexp, cv(s0))), w0)
  nn0uz()

blocks.name: aaliou2
blocks.content: Liouville's approximation theorem for algebraic numbers per se. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Nov-2014.)

blocks.name: aaliou2b
blocks.content: Liouville's approximation theorem extended to complex ` A ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Nov-2014.)

} = {
  a1ii(c0 ∈ ℝ, c2 =(s2 ∈ ℕ ↦ sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s2),(c1 ` s1))))

  1nn()

  aaliou3lem3(s1, s2, s0, nat1, c1, (s2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1)↦((2[^]-u((! ` 1)))[×]((1[÷]2)[^](s2[-]1)))))

  rpre(sum(s1 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 1),(c1 ` s1)))

  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℕ →(c1 ` c0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ c2 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[^]-u((! ` s0))))

blocks.name: aaliou3lem9
blocks.content: Example of a "Liouville number", a very simple definable transcendental real. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 20-Nov-2014.)

  diff.hs1.w(wa(wn(wceq(c0, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs2)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))))), wn(wbr(co(cv(s1), cdiv, co(co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))), cexp, cv(s0))), clt, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, co(co(cfv(c2, cv(hs2)), cmul, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), cdiv, co(nat2, cexp, cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))))))))))

blocks.name: aaliou3
blocks.content: Example of a "Liouville number", a very simple definable transcendental real. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 23-Nov-2014.)

thm aaliou3(setvar s0) {

} = {
  nelir(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(s0))))), caa)
  aaliou3lem9(hs0, hs2, hs1, csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(s0))))), cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cmpt(hs1, cn, csu(hs2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cv(hs2)))))
  eqtri(csu(s0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(s0))))), csu(hs2, cn, cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cv(hs2))), csu(hs2, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))))))
  cbvsumv(s0, hs2, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(s0)))), co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))))
  oveq2d(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(s0))), cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs2)))
  negeqd(cfv(cfa, cv(s0)), cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs2)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs2), cfa)
  sumeq2i(hs2, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cv(hs2)))
  eqcomd(co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs2), cn))
  fvmpt(hs0, cv(hs2), cn, cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)))), co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)))))
  oveq2d(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))), cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  negeqd(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfa, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs2), cfa)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))))
  ovex(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs2))))
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, cn, csu(hs2, co(nat1, cfz, cv(hs1)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cn, co(nat2, cexp, cneg(cfv(cfa, cv(hs0))))), cv(hs2)))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)

} = {
  nelir(sum(s0 ∈ ℕ,(2[^]-u((! ` s0)))), caa)
  aaliou3lem9(hs0, hs2, hs1, sum(s0 ∈ ℕ,(2[^]-u((! ` s0)))), (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[^]-u((! ` hs0)))), (hs1 ∈ ℕ ↦ sum(hs2 ∈(1[...]hs1),((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[^]-u((! ` hs0))))` hs2))))
  eqtri(sum(s0 ∈ ℕ,(2[^]-u((! ` s0)))), sum(hs2 ∈ ℕ,((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[^]-u((! ` hs0))))` hs2)), sum(hs2 ∈ ℕ,(2[^]-u((! ` hs2)))))

  fvmpt(hs0, hs2, cn, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(2[^]-u((! ` hs0)))), (2[^]-u((! ` hs2))), (2[^]-u((! ` hs0))))
  oveq2d(nat2, cexp, -u((! ` hs0)), -u((! ` hs2)), hs0 = hs2)
